languages.text: На орбите мира Эпитафия флагман династии фон Валанциус принял последний бой с существом, что некогда звалось их Лорд-капитаном. Экипаж в полном составе принял жестокую смерть от холодных рук бывшего Вольного Торговца, когда он{mf||а} ворвал{mf|ся|ась} из холодной пустоты на капитанский мостик.

In Epitaph's orbit, the von Valancius flagship took a last stand against the creature that had once been its Lord Captain. The crew met grizzly ends to the last man at the frigid hands of the former Rogue Trader when {mf|he|she} broke onto the bridge from the cold void.
languages.original_text: На орбите мира Эпитафия флагман династии фон Валанциус принял последний бой с существом, что некогда звалось их Лорд-капитаном. Экипаж в полном составе принял жестокую смерть от холодных рук бывшего Вольного Торговца, когда он{mf||а} ворвал{mf|ся|ась} из холодной пустоты на капитанский мостик.

traits.locale_text: On the orbit of the Epitaph world, the flagship of the von Valancius dynasty took the last stand against the creature that once was their Lord Captain. The crew to the last man violently died by the cold hands of the former Rogue Trader, when {mf|he|she} broke into the bridge from the cold void. While Master Helmsman Ravor, bleeding profusely, steered the ship to ram the sinister crypt and High Factotum Janris Danrok covered Vox Master from devastating strikes with his enormous body, Vigdis Surri Otta of the Toliman dynasty broadcasted news of horrible betrayal on all vox-frequencies. And then she stopped.

And then she stopped.

In Epitaph's orbit, the von Valancius flagship took a last stand against the creature that had once been its Lord Captain. The crew met grizzly ends to the last man by the frigid hands of the former Rogue Trader when {mf|he|she} broke onto the bridge from the cold void. While Master Helmsman Ravor, bleeding profusely, steered the ship to ram the sinister crypt and High Factotum Janris Danrok covered Vox Master from devastating blows with his enormous body, Vigdis Surri Otta of the Toliman dynasty broadcast news of the horrible betrayal on every vox-frequency. And then she went silent.

And then she went silent.

In Epitaph's orbit, the von Valancius flagship took a last stand against the creature that had once been its Lord Captain. The crew met grizzly ends to the last man at the frigid hands of the former Rogue Trader when {mf|he|she} broke onto the bridge from the cold void.

languages.text: 在荒垄碑碣的轨道上，冯·瓦兰修斯家族旗舰进行了最后的抵抗，试图击退曾是领主舰长的生物。前任行商浪人从冰冷的虚空中闯入舰桥，用{mf|他|她}那同样冰冷的双手无情地杀死了每位船员。
languages.original_text: In Epitaph's orbit, the von Valancius flagship took a last stand against the creature that had once been its Lord Captain. The crew met grizzly ends to the last man at the frigid hands of the former Rogue Trader when {mf|he|she} broke onto the bridge from the cold void.

traits.locale_text: 在荒垄碑碣的轨道上，冯·瓦兰修斯家族旗舰进行了最后的抵抗，试图击退曾是领主舰长的生物。前任行商浪人从冰冷的虚空中闯入舰桥，用{mf|他|她}那同样冰冷的双手无情地杀死了每位船员。

languages.text: Im Orbit von Epitaph kämpfte das Valancius-Flaggschiff ein letztes Mal gegen die Kreatur, die einmal sein Lord Captain gewesen war. Die gesamte Crew fand ein grausames Ende durch die eisigen Hände {mf|des ehemaligen Freihändlers, der|der ehemaligen Freihändlerin, die} aus der kalten Leere kommend in das Schiff eindrang und sich Zugang zur Brücke verschaffte.
languages.original_text: In Epitaph's orbit, the von Valancius flagship took a last stand against the creature that had once been its Lord Captain. The crew met grizzly ends to the last man at the frigid hands of the former Rogue Trader when {mf|he|she} broke onto the bridge from the cold void.

traits.locale_text: Im Orbit von Epitaph kämpfte das Valancius-Flaggschiff ein letztes Mal gegen die Kreatur, die einmal sein Lord Captain gewesen war. Die gesamte Crew fand ein grausames Ende durch die eisigen Hände {mf|des ehemaligen Freihändlers, der|der ehemaligen Freihändlerin, die} aus der kalten Leere kommend in das Schiff eindrang und sich Zugang zur Brücke verschaffte. Trotz schwerster Blutungen lenkte Hauptsteuermann Ravor das Schiff in die finstere Krypta, um diese zu rammen. Hoch-Faktotum Janris Danrok beschützte die Voxmeisterin mit seinem gewaltigen Körper vor verheerenden Angriffen, während Vigdis Surri Otta von der Toliman-Dynastie auf sämtlichen Vox-Frequenzen von dem schrecklichen Verrat berichtete. Und dann verstummte sie.

languages.text: C'est sur l'orbite d'Épitaphe que le vaisseau amiral des von Valancius affronta pour la dernière fois la créature qui avait un jour été {mf|son seigneur-capitaine|sa seigneure-capitaine}. L'équipage connut un destin funeste aux mains de {mf|l'ancien libre-marchand|l'ancienne libre-marchande} quand {mf|celui-ci|celle-ci} fit irruption sur la passerelle.
languages.original_text: In Epitaph's orbit, the von Valancius flagship took a last stand against the creature that had once been its Lord Captain. The crew met grizzly ends to the last man at the frigid hands of the former Rogue Trader when {mf|he|she} broke onto the bridge from the cold void.

traits.locale_text: C'est sur l'orbite d'Épitaphe que le vaisseau amiral des von Valancius affronta pour la dernière fois la créature qui avait un jour été {mf|son seigneur-capitaine|sa seigneure-capitaine}. L'équipage connut un destin funeste aux mains de {mf|l'ancien libre-marchand|l'ancienne libre-marchande} quand {mf|celui-ci|celle-ci} fit irruption sur la passerelle.

languages.text: En la órbita de Epitafio, la nave insignia von Valancius libró su batalla final contra la criatura que una vez fue su Lord Capitán. La tripulación al completo encontró una muerte horrible entre las manos gélidas de{mf|l| la} antes Comerciante Independiente cuando se presentó en el puente desde el vacío.
languages.original_text: In Epitaph's orbit, the von Valancius flagship took a last stand against the creature that had once been its Lord Captain. The crew met grizzly ends to the last man at the frigid hands of the former Rogue Trader when {mf|he|she} broke onto the bridge from the cold void.

traits.locale_text: En la órbita de Epitafio, la nave insignia von Valancius libró su batalla final contra la criatura que una vez fue su Lord Capitán. La tripulación al completo encontró una muerte horrible entre las manos gélidas de{mf|l| la} antes Comerciante Independiente cuando se presentó en el puente desde el vacío.

languages.text: エピタフの軌道上で、フォン・ヴァランシウスの旗艦はかつてのロード・キャプテンのなれの果てに最後の抵抗を試みた。寒々とした虚空からブリッジに降り立った自由開拓者が凍てつく両手を差し伸べると、クルーたちは誰もが忌まわしい最期の時を迎えた。
languages.original_text: In Epitaph's orbit, the von Valancius flagship took a last stand against the creature that had once been its Lord Captain. The crew met grizzly ends to the last man at the frigid hands of the former Rogue Trader when {mf|he|she} broke onto the bridge from the cold void.

traits.locale_text: エピタフの軌道上で、フォン・ヴァランシウスの旗艦はかつてのロード・キャプテンのなれの果てに最後の抵抗を試みた。寒々とした虚空からブリッジに降り立った自由開拓者が凍てつく両手を差し伸べると、クルーたちは誰もが忌まわしい最期の時を迎えた。

languages.text: Von Valancius sancak gemisi, bir zamanlar Lord Kaptan'ı olan yaratığa karşı Sinyazıt'ın yörüngesinde son bir savaş verdi. Eski Hür Tacir, uçsuzun soğukluğunda köprüye daldı ve buz gibi elleriyle tüm mürettebatı; geride kimseyi bırakmayana dek, iğrenç şekillerde, tek tek öldürdü.
languages.original_text: In Epitaph's orbit, the von Valancius flagship took a last stand against the creature that had once been its Lord Captain. The crew met grizzly ends to the last man at the frigid hands of the former Rogue Trader when {mf|he|she} broke onto the bridge from the cold void.

traits.locale_text: Von Valancius sancak gemisi, bir zamanlar Lord Kaptan'ı olan yaratığa karşı Kitabe'nin yörüngesinde son bir savaş verdi. Eski Hür Tacir uçsuzun soğukluğundan köprüye daldı ve buz gibi elleriyle tüm mürettebatı, hiç kimse kalmayana dek, iğrenç şekillerde, tek tek öldürdü.
